actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hippogriff makes one Beak attack and one Claws attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (1d10+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Dive (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: While flying, the hippogriff dives onto a creature below it. The hippogriff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a creature it can see. The target must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Sight
special_abilities.desc: The hippogriff's Perception is 18 when perceiving by sight.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The hippogriff is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
